node.text:
This week Patrick (@patrick_odonnell_fb) sat down with Rhiannon from @sofadotcom to discuss the importance of colour in the home.

Patrick created three different colour schemes that will help inspire you to introduce colour and texture throughout your home, from open-plan living spaces to calm living rooms and cosy bedrooms.

#FarrowandBall

node.text:
To celebrate International Colour Day, @JoaStudholme sat down with designer Nicola Harding (@nicolahardingandco) to discuss all things colour. They've answered some of your FAQ's, from how to be bold with colour to their worst paint colour choices ever. So we hope you settle down with a cup of tea and enjoy this lovely chat!

#FarrowandBall #InternationalColourDay

node.title: All Things Colour with Joa Studholme and Nicola Harding

node.text:
To celebrate International Women’s Day, we asked @JoaStudholme, Colour Curator, and @CharlieCosby, Head of Creative, a few questions about their careers, their favourite colours and women in the industry who keep them inspired. 

We hope some of these wonderful women, including @AbiMarvel, @StudioSpelling and @SolangeAzagury, inspire you on this important day. 

 #IWD2021

node.title: Meet The Women Behind Our Colours!

node.text:
Today, we’re inviting you inside Cathy Chivers’ Herefordshire holiday rental, a Nordic chalet whose distinctive exterior you might recognise from Netflix UK’s Sex Education.

Cathy recently enlisted the help of Farrow & Ball colour expert Kat Billings to transform the picturesque property’s all-neutral rooms into cosy, characterful spaces.

If you’re ready to start your own home transformation, visit www.fal.cn/VirtualCC to learn all about our virtual colour consultancy service.

node.title: A Herefordshire chalet transformed by Colour Consultancy

node.text:
For an extra dose of inspiration, we asked Joa Studholme, our Colour Curator, to show us how to use colour in an urban home, starting off with the hallway,

Featuring Down Pipe walls and Strong White painted floors in our Modern finishes, this space is as hardwearing as it is beautiful!

#FarrowandBall

node.title: Decorating Your Hallway with Joa Studholme

node.text:
Joel and Molly, the founders of pyjama brand @DesmondandDempsey, recently created their dream bedroom with a little help from our richly pigmented colours and expert Colour Consultant Patrick O'Donnell.

See how their Virtual Colour Consultancy went and how they came up with the perfect scheme for their space. Visit www.f-b.ltd/BedroomMakeover

Featuring Shaded White walls, Mouse's Back woodwork and a dreamy headboard by @trovebystudioduggan

node.title: A Virtual Colour Consultancy with Patrick and Desmond & Dempsey

node.text:
Today, Patrick's catching up with Lucinda Chambers and Serena Hood, founders of @Collagerie, to chat all about #ADooringColour, a series of stylish front doors to celebrate the launch of our Colour By Nature palette in our long-lasting Exterior Eggshell finish.

Visit https://f-b.ltd/ADooringColour to see all of the doors each featuring one of our new colours.

node.text:
Introducing Living With Colour, our four part film series from 2019 in collaboration with @themodernhouse.

In our first instalment, we visited Natalie Jones, owner of design shop Caro in Somerset. Her home features a varied scheme of Farrow & Ball shades, including our deep Green Smoke as well as De Nimes, Hardwick White, Bancha and Railings.

We caught up with Natalie on The Chromologist to talk about her home, visit f-b.ltd/LivingWithColour1 to read this inspiring interview.

node.text:
To showcase our #ColourByNature palette to New York City’s colour lovers, we’ve joined forces with design firm @roman_and_williams_, whose destination design store RW Guild is playing host to an imaginative installation showcasing the true colours of nature.

Inspired by the spirit of Werner's Nomenclature Of Colours, Roman and Williams have created colourful curiosity cases of bird sculptures and botanical models, evoking the vibrancy of our 16 new colours.

If you're based in the Big Apple, see the installation for yourself until December. Learn more about this wonderful partnership here: https://f-b.ltd/FaBxRomanandWilliams

node.title: In Conversation With Roman and Williams

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Farrow & Ball on September 12, 2021. May be an image of tree, outdoors and door.

node.text:
The most uplifting shade for a front door 💕

If you're looking for a modern and more matt look, our Exterior Eggshell finish is perfect for exterior wood and metal with 20% sheen.

Who else has used this rosy pink?

🎨 #NancysBlushes
📷 @livingtheinterior

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Farrow & Ball in Canada. May be an image of living room.

node.text:
#FadedTerracotta on the wall, a walnut herringbone ceiling and a lakefront view - we don't think this room could get any better! 🌞

This soft pale orange from our California Collection was made for warm, open spaces like this.

📷 @marianordlunddesign
#FaBxKW #FarrowandBall

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Farrow & Ball in Berlin, Germany. May be an image of flower and indoor.

node.text:
Brightening up your feed with #SapGreen woodwork and yellow blooms 🌿🌼

#SkimmedMilkWhite on the walls offers a soft wash of colour, helping the earthy green tones on the panelling and door take centre stage!

📷 @herz.und.blut
#ColourByNature #FarrowandBall

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Farrow & Ball on September 10, 2021. May be an image of indoor.

node.text:
A pink clawfoot bathtub, vintage tropical decor and #Palm on the walls & woodwork make for the most fabulous master bedroom, wouldn't you agree? 🌴💕

📷 @thepalm_residence

#FaBxKW #FarrowandBall

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Farrow & Ball on September 09, 2021. May be an image of indoor.

node.text:
What an incredible bathroom transformation 😍🛁 (swipe to see the before!)

Melissa @lakeandlumber worked with one of our Colour Consultants to create a bright and airy bathroom. The beauty of a Colour Consultant is that they take your preferences into account, whilst recommending colours that you may not have initially considered but end up falling in love with!

This was definitely the case here, with #ElephantsBreath being the winning colour for the beautiful panelling, adding depth and warmth. How stunning! ✨

To enquire about our virtual and in-home Colour Consultancy services, head to the link in our bio.

📷 @lakeandlumber
#FarrowandBall

node.text:
A beautiful example of how to extend a scheme across two rooms 💛 #IndiaYellow in the kitchen creates immense warmth, but is made extra cosy when used next to #Railings in the adjoining reading nook. 

Patrick is back on our stories today with more scheme ideas featuring India Yellow - we'd love to know what colours you'd pair it with too!

📷 @ahometomakeyousmile
#FarrowandBall

#LivingRoomGoals #FarrowandBall

node.text:
Let there be light ✨

Introducing The Muse: a beautiful portable and sustainable lamp inspired by museum glass and the depth of our richly pigmented colours, created by @tala.

Mixing the classic lantern aesthetic with modern technology, each light is painted in a bespoke Farrow & Ball colour to create a timeless heirloom for the home.

Pictured here is The Muse in Pleasure Garden, a silvery green grey with irresistible intrigue and depth.

#FarrowandBall #Tala

node.text:
#Salt, #Sand and #Tar are three complementary neutrals from our California Collection to remind you of golden beaches and road trips along the coast ✨

Head to our stories today to find out more about the inspiration behind the colours and how they got their names!

1. Salt (upper wall), Dimpse (panelling) and Plummett (floor)
2. Sand (upper wall), London Stone (panelling and floor) and Wimborne White (coving)
3. Tar (door), Peignoir (walls) and Strong White (trim and floor)

#FaBxKW #FarrowandBall
